```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(naniar)
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
getwd()
```

```{r}
avocado <- read_csv("avocado-updated-2020 2.csv")
```

```{r}
avocado 
```

```{r}
avocado %>% 
  select("year", "geography", "average_price") %>% 
  arrange(desc(average_price))
```
```{r}
organic_avocado %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=geography, y=average_price, fill=year))+ 
  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.4)+ 
  facet_grid(year~.)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust = 1))

```

```{r}
organic_avocado %>% 
  select("year", "geography", "average_price") 
```
```{r}
organic_avocado %>% 
  select("year", "geography", "average_price") %>% 
  filter(year == 2015) 
```




```{r}
organic_avocado %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=geography, y=average_price, fill=year)) +
  coord_flip() +
  geom_boxplot()
```


```{r}
names(avocado)
#4046 = non-organic small/medium Hass Avocados (3-5 oz)  
#4225 = non-organic large Hass Avocados (8-10 oz)
#4770 = non-organic extra large Hass Avocados (10-15 oz)
```

```{r}
organic_avocado <- avocado %>% 
                      filter(type == "organic")
organic_avocado %>% 
  arrange(desc(total_volume))
```

```{r}
normie_avocado <- avocado %>% 
                      filter(type == "conventional")
normie_avocado %>% 
  arrange(desc(total_volume))
```

```{r}
avocado %>% 
  tabyl(geography)
```
